input.sentences: the products i used were very efficient .
we mixed all of the ingredients together .
i used my hand to do most of the kitchen work .
the cake was delicious and yummy .

output.sentences: Buy things that are premade to be efficient in the kitchen and save time.

Hand made items taste the best.
